sense.def:
One's address
so podatki o hišni številki, imenu ulice in kraja, v katerem človek živi.

seg.quote: The address is 70 Brompton Road, London SW1.

sense.def:
Kadar je pismo
addressed to someone
sta na njem napisana ime in naslov tistega človeka.

An address
je tudi uradni nagovor.

seg.quote: He gave an address to the Psychological Association.

sense.def:
To address a group of people
pomeni govoriti skupini ljudi.

seg.quote: He addressed a meeting in Bristol.

sense.def:
Če človek
addresses a problem
se z njim sooči ali spopade.

seg.quote: He has not addressed the issue of the strike.
